      • countryExist

        public boolean countryExist(java.lang.String iso)
        从接口复制的说明: CountryDao
        To check whether a certain country exists in the database
        指定者:
        countryExist 在接口中 CountryDao
        参数:
        iso - The ISO that represents the country
        返回:
        If exists,returns true. Otherwise, returns false.
